title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to chat with local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and RAG.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that offers ChatGPT-like experience for any local model served by Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing fluent builders and POJO mapping for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and embedding with Ollama from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and integrating Ollama with Flask, Next.js, Home-Assistant, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and compose snippets for running Ollama in Docker.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and module for declarative Ollama installation and service configuration.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template combining Ollama, Chroma, LangChain, and Streamlit for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Simple Discord bot that forwards user prompts to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with any Ollama model through Slack threads and slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama chat and embeddings to any MCP-compatible client.

title: ollama-on-bentoml
summary: BentoML service definition that autoscales Ollama models behind a REST/gRPC endpoint with adaptive batching.
